code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class Button extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={count:0};}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter__button-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"counter__digit",children:this.state.count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"counter__buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button minus",onClick:()=>this.countFunc(0),children:"Minus"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button plus",onClick:()=>this.countFunc(1),children:"+ Plus"})]})]});}countFunc(task){if(task===1){this.setState({count:this.state.count+1});}else{if(this.state.count==0){console.log("Nope");}else{this.setState({count:this.state.count-1});}}}}export default Button;
